parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The main streaming domain for which you want to query the transcoding length.

*   If you do not set this parameter, the transcoding length for all your domain names is returned.
*   You can specify multiple domain names and separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The interval at which the transcoding length is to be queried. Unit: seconds. Valid values:

*   **3600**: Query the transcoding length by hour.
*   **86400**: Query the transcoding length by day.

If you do not set this parameter, the transcoding length is queries by hour.

parameters.name: Split
parameters.description:
The key that is used to group data. Valid values:

*   **domain**: the domain name.
*   **region**: the region that is used as the live center of ApsaraVideo Live.
*   **transcode_type**: the transcoding type.
*   **resolution**: the resolution of the transcoded stream.
*   **fps**: the frame rate of the transcoded stream.

You can specify one or more keys. If you specify multiple keys, separate them with commas (,).

Default value: `domain,region,transcode_type,resolution,fps`.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

*   The minimum query interval is 1 hour.
*   If you do not set this parameter, the transcoding length for the last 24 hours is returned.
